title: Page Break Missing When Previewing PDF
description: When previewing an attached file in PDF, the expected page break in the first item didn't occur.
OB: When previewing an attached file in PDF, the page break in the first item did not happen.
EB: When previewing an attached file in PDF, I expected to see a page break in the first item to separate it from the rest of the content.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the software.
2. Attach a file in PDF format.
3. Preview the attached PDF file.
4. Observe the first item, and you will notice that there is no page break as expected.
